explains: adj. 半心半意的；缺乏热情的

sentences.en: He made a half-hearted attempt to justify himself.
sentences.cn: 他没有尽力证明自己有理。

sentences.en: Government action has been half-hearted and uncoordinated.
sentences.cn: 政府的行动一直半心半意，也不协调。

sentences.en: I am sorry that he should be so half-hearted about the important work.
sentences.cn: 我很遗憾，他对这项重要工作竟这样敷衍塞责。
